title: Repo sync
author: docs-bot
details: **Copilot Custom Instructions**: Added support for `AGENTS.md`, `CLAUDE.md`, and `GEMINI.md` files in repositories to enhance Copilot coding agent context.
**Primer React Update**: Upgraded `@primer/react` to v37.31.0 and configured Next.js to transpile Primer CSS/assets.
**Landing Carousel**: Implemented a responsive article carousel component for category landing pages with mobile/desktop views and navigation.

original_description:
This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.
Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.
raw_analysis:
### Summary
- **Copilot Custom Instructions**: Added support for `AGENTS.md`, `CLAUDE.md`, and `GEMINI.md` files in repositories to enhance Copilot coding agent context.
- **Primer React Update**: Upgraded `@primer/react` to v37.31.0 and configured Next.js to transpile Primer CSS/assets.
- **Landing Carousel**: Implemented a responsive article carousel component for category landing pages with mobile/desktop views and navigation.
